text:
The Retirement Board, Health Service Board or Retiree Health Trust Fund Board shall notify the Department of Elections or Contractor at least 120 days prior to the first day that ballots may be marked and delivered (hereafter referred to as the "First Voting Day") that an election shall be held. 
(Added by Ord. 512-80, App. 10/29/80; amended by Ord. 378-95, App. 12/7/95; Ord. 285-08, File No. 081190, App. 12/5/2008)

heading.catch_text: NOTICE TO DEPARTMENT OF ELECTIONS OR CONTRACTOR.
